reviewText: Great movie. I don't know how the actor can keep an straight looking face. But, that is what makes it, you don't know what he is thinking. The actress is good. an, between the 2 of them, it makes the movie great!

I first saw this series on Netflix streaming where the translation was put into a form not unlike proper English.  The translation on the DVDs is a literal translation of Mandarin which is harder to understand, especially when dialog is moving so fast.  Overall, a drama well worth the time as the lead actress is so adorable and the relationship with the male lead is electric.
I am not Asian and I watched this, and loved it. one of the best shows ever. I tried to find a poster but couldn't. I would recommend this.
I really liked this drama,that is why i bought it
I have seen this drama and if you like asian dramas this is a must see.  The romance and chemistry between the leads is off the charts.  Great story line and just an overall fun drama.
